name: Lifebuoy Lemon Fresh Soap
description: Thought to originate in southern India, Burma and China lemons have long been known for their powerful natural antibacterial and disinfectant properties. The fresh, citrus notes in Lifebuoy Lemon Fresh Bar Soap will help keep you fresh all day while preventing body odour. The rich, creamy lather leaves you clean and fresh while the advanced formulation cares for your skin. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
